Name: Ivijan Stefan Stipić
AboutMe:
My name is Ivijan-Stefan I'm a professional web developer, coder and designer with many years of experience. Since 2003 I dealing with the internet technologies. All my skilIs are: PHP, JSON, MySQL, HTML5, CSS3, SVG, XML, Javascript, AJAX and jQuery. I also do graphic web design and photomontage.

Over the years I developed various modular, fully dynamic, SEO optimized CMS systems for web shops, social networks, blogs, forums, plugins, themplates and specifically for the needs of companies and enterprises with advanced administration for the entire system.

Since July 2014 I launched an agency for the design and web development CREATIVFORM™

CreativForm™ is an agency based on a team of highly talented people with more than 10 years’ experience in design, marketing, Internet and web development. Our team is composed of highly trained and experienced people in different areas of internet business, who help us achieve our goals in delivering an optimum and first class service to our clients.

Basic concept of our agency is a strong bound between our clients that need specific service in design, marketing and Internet technology, and our team that is highly qualified to fulfill complex demands of our clients.

We are always opened for business, new clients and collaboration. We give you a good price and an excellent support. We also have a strong collaboration with our business partners that further improve the quality of our service.

Find more about us at this link: www.creativform.com

It is very easy to get in touch with me, you just need to send message.
